entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
